SEARCH
Package fr.tiogars.network

Class Device

java.lang.Object
fr.tiogars.network.Device
public class Device extends Object
Represents a network device with a name, type, and associated interfaces. A Device is categorized by its DeviceType and can have multiple network interfaces.

  • Constructor Summary
